001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.config;
002
003import org.aeonbits.owner.ConfigCache;
004
005/**
006 * Singleton holder for API configuration settings.
007 *
008 * <p>This class provides a centralized mechanism to retrieve and cache
009 * the API configuration using the {@code Owner} library.
010 * It ensures that the configuration is only loaded once and reused throughout the application.
011 *
012 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
013 */
014public class ApiConfigHolder {
015
016   private ApiConfigHolder() {
017   }
018
019   private static ApiConfig config;
020
021   /**
022    * Retrieves the API configuration instance.
023    *
024    * <p>If the configuration is not already loaded, it is initialized
025    * using {@code ConfigCache.getOrCreate(ApiConfig.class)}.
026    *
027    * @return The {@code ApiConfig} instance.
028    */
029   public static ApiConfig getApiConfig() {
030      if (config == null) {
031         config = ConfigCache.getOrCreate(ApiConfig.class);
032      }
033      return config;
034   }
035
036   /**
037    * For testing purposes only.
038    *
039    * <p>Resets the cached {@link ApiConfig} instance. This method should only be used in unit tests
040    * to ensure test isolation and prevent state leakage between tests.
041    * </p>
042    */
043   static void resetForTest() {
044      config = null;
045   }
046
047}
